mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE users.username like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR users.email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR users.nickname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%');

SELECT c.comment_id, c.review_id, c.created_at, c.content, r.content as ReviewContent FROM review_comment c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN review r ON c.review_id = r.review_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, nickname, profile_image, provider_type, role_type) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{providerType}, #{roleType});
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.content, r.created_at, i.image FROM review r LEFT JOIN review_images i ON r.review_id = i.review_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.review_id, r.content, r.created_at, i.image FROM review r JOIN review_like rl ON r.review_id = rl.review_id LEFT JOIN review_images i ON r.review_id = i.review_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE rl.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
